description: This file provides service functions for managing 'outcomes' related to decisions, including listing, creating, updating, and deleting outcomes, with permission checks and audit logging.

methods.name: ensureDecisionOwner({ decisionId, userId, client })
methods.description: Checks if the decision belongs to the user and exists; throws error if not.

methods.name: listOutcomes({ userId, decisionId })
methods.description: Retrieves list of outcomes for a specific decision owned by a user.

methods.name: createOutcome({ userId, decisionId, payload, ip, userAgent, requestId })
methods.description: Creates a new outcome for a decision, performing permission check and audit logging.

methods.name: updateOutcome({ userId, outcomeId, payload, ip, userAgent, requestId })
methods.description: Updates an existing outcome after ownership validation, with audit logging.

methods.name: deleteOutcome({ userId, outcomeId, ip, userAgent, requestId })
methods.description: Deletes an outcome after ownership validation, with audit logging.

ctags.name: createOutcome
ctags.pattern: /^async function createOutcome({ userId, decisionId, payload, ip, userAgent, requestId }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ userId, decisionId, payload, ip, userAgent, requestId })

ctags.name: deleteOutcome
ctags.pattern: /^async function deleteOutcome({ userId, outcomeId, ip, userAgent, requestId }) {$/

ctags.name: updateOutcome
ctags.pattern: /^async function updateOutcome({ userId, outcomeId, payload, ip, userAgent, requestId }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ userId, outcomeId, payload, ip, userAgent, requestId })
